朽木不可雕.definition: lit. rotten wood cannot be carved (idiom); fig. you can't make a silk purse out of a sow's ear

朽木可雕.definition: (idiom) even though a person may have shortcomings, there is still room for improvement

朽蠹.definition: to decay and be eaten by worms etc; to overhoard grain so that it rots
